item.title: Useful Mouse Key Mapping Share
item.description:
Mouse 5 key mapped to F12 F12 is the “Go to Definition” function in Visual Studio and VS Code Shift + F12 is the “Find All References” function

This allows for a more comfortable posture when browsing code. Right-handed users can give it a try.
